law.catch_line: Short title for KRS 142.400 to 142.408 -- Kentucky Tourism, Meeting, and Convention Marketing Act.
law.text: KRS 142.400 to 142.408 may be cited as the Kentucky Tourism, Meeting, and Convention Marketing Act.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 71, effective June 1, 2005.
